Posts.Content: Mar 12, 2010 02:42PM 2GIRLSII wrote: Hmm..so iMRI couldn't diagnos or identify a papilloma, then I guess mri can't spot or identify a fiboradenoma either (?). Wow. What threw me was the statement that there are no cysts and lack of any acknowledgement of the fibroadenoma....
